quoteFirst: He rises on the 1st, 15th and 30th at 12:27 p. m., 11:54 a. m., and 11:24 a. m., and sets on the 2d, 16th, and May 1st at 3:09, 2:22, and
quoteLast: , respectively. On the 4th, at 10:26 a. m., his position is 8° 10′ north of the moon, and on the 1st a little northeast of the nebula _Præsepe_ in _Cancer_.

quoteFirst: The session was taken up with the question of Jews and judges sitting in parliament.  A resolution was passed excluding the former, and by a vote of
quoteLast: the assembly passed a bill excluding judges as well.  This bill was rejected by the legislative council, and a hostile feeling arose between the governor and the assembly, whose speaker, M. Panet, he looked on with special aversion as a shareholder in _Le Canadien_.
title: General Brock
author: Edgar, Matilda Ridout, Lady, 1844-1910
